SELECT ic.comment_level AS commentLevel, ic.content AS content, ic.created_time AS createdTime, ic.sepc_name AS specName, u.nickname AS nickName, u.face AS userFace FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, specTemp.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN( price_discount ) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) specTemp ON specTemp.item_id = i.id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
specTemp.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, specTemp.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN( price_discount ) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) specTemp ON specTemp.item_id = i.id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
specTemp.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
